name: Don't Drown! #1
description:
"Don't drown!" #1

Responding to the incident of drowning people that often occur on the beach near my house (Serang Beach, Blitar, East Java, Indonesia). This edition is based on the usual logic and experience of the surrounding community who have become accustomed to the waves of the ocean, regardless of the myths and mystical stories inherent in the southern sea of Indonesia. Most people who drown because they do not understand the terrain, ignoring warnings, negligence, carelessness and panic when dragged by the waves.

"Don't lose your way when you are dragged by the waves, you calm down so you know the way out."

-----------
